title: Lydia Bright's mother Debbie cradles her daughter's baby bump in sweet throwback snap
text:
She's set to welcome her first baby - a daughter - with her ex Lee Cronin in February next year.

And Lydia Bright has revealed she's looking forward to welcoming the third generation of her family as she posed with her doting mother Debbie during their sun-soaked trip to Turkey.

In a cosy throwback snap posted to Instagram on Sunday, the former TOWIE star, 29, looked typically radiant as she sported a black bikini, while her doting parent, 55, cradled her growing baby bump during their time by the scenic sea.

Lydia Bright has revealed she's looking forward to welcoming the third generation of her family as she posed with her doting mother Debbie during their sun-soaked trip to Turkey

The TV personality displayed her tanned complexion in the classic two-piece while shielding her eyes from the sun in a pair of circular-framed shades.

With her blonde tresses styled into a messy bun, the mother-to-be opted for minimal make-up.

Debbie cut an equally stylish figure in a navy strapless swimsuit as she warmly embraced her daughter on a deck.

Lydia cheekily captioned the image: 'Three generations... Don’t kill me for the emoji @xdebbietowiex', alongside emojis of a baby, an middle-aged woman and an elderly woman.

Mother-to-be! The former TOWIE star, 29, is set to welcome her first baby - a daughter - with her ex Lee Cronin in February next year

Oh baby! The TV personality displayed her 'dinky' bump at 20 weeks pregnant in a separate image posted to her Instagram Story

The Jump star recently confirmed that she is expecting a baby girl in February after throwing a gender reveal party with her family and friends.

She told Hello! magazine: 'Oh my gosh it's so exciting, I've just found out I'm having a little girl! I wasn't bothered either way, girl or boy, but I do think that now I know it's a girl it's that little bit more special.

'She'll be my best friend. Me and Mum are really close and I love our relationship – I'm hoping that me and my daughter have something just as special, just as strong.'

Lydia also revealed she has no plans to raise her child 'gender neutral' and will be giving her a 'girly' bedroom.

Break up: The reality star first announced her pregnancy in August, but also but revealed she'd split from the father of her child Lee after a two-year on/off romance

She shared: 'The boy's room would have been lovely, but the girl's room, I'll make it all pink, a proper princess… I don't care if it's tacky.

'My kid is definitely not going to be gender neutral. I'm having tutus, flowery dresses… I want my girl to be very, very girly.'

Lydia, who is having her baby with ex-boyfriend Lee, said she had a boy's name already picked out but has a list of girls names that she is trying to decide between.

The reality star was given the sex of her baby last month by doctors but waited until the party to find out what she is having.

'It's so exciting: The Jump star recently confirmed that she is expecting a baby girl in February after throwing a gender reveal party with her family and friends

The reality star - who rose to fame on The Only Way Is Essex in 2010 - gushed she's content with the news after getting years of 'travelling and partying' out of her system.

While Lydia is pleased to become a first-time mother, the pregnant star confirmed she split from her long-term partner Lee after being in a relationship for more than two years.

The couple first briefly parted ways in January with Lydia confirming they had split for good in August.

It's also been a celebratory time for Debbie as a recent, as she finally tied the knot to her long-term partner Dave Bright in a scenic ceremony at the All Saints Woodford Wells Church in Essex after a 40-year relationship.
description: The former TOWIE star, 29, has revealed she's looking forward to welcoming the third generation of her family as she posed with her doting mother Debbie during their sun-soaked trip to Turkey.
